EmailTemplate.name: Manhattan VA Townhall
EmailTemplate.subject: Let the Manhattan VA know what you think
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
IAVA is working with the Manhattan VA to organize a roundtable for veterans to discuss important issues effecting them. The OIF/OEF clinic coordinator will be stopping by the IAVA offices this Wednesday evening to talk about some of the issue facing veterans in Manhattan. This will be a critical time to have our voices heard by the leadership of the local VA.
WHAT: Manhattan VA Roundtable WHERE: IAVA Offices (292 Madison Avenue, 10th Floor) WHEN: 7-8pm, Wednesday, January 30th
If you are free this evening we would love for you to stop by and be part of this important conversation. Sign up here: http://iava.org/manhattan-va-townhall.
Best,
Jason -- Jason Hansman Senior Program Manager - Health Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA) 292 Madison Avenue, 10th Floor New York, NY 10017 212.982.9699 jason@iava.org www.iava.org Follow us on Twitter: @IAVA
